animatium.title: Animatium Config
animatium.removeSmoothSneaking: Remove the smooth first-person sneak animation (1.8-1.12.2)
animatium.removeSmoothSneaking.descripti: Removes the smooth sneaking camera animation, making it like it was in 1.8-1.12.2.
animatium.oldSneakAnimationInterpolation: Bring back the old sneaking animation interpolation (<=1.7)
Brings back the <=1.7.x sneaking camera animation interpolation.
animatium.oldSneakEyeHeight.description: Changes the sneak eye height to be as it was <=1.13.2.
animatium.fixSneakingFeetPosition.descri: Fixes the sneaking model offset to be like <=1.11.x.
animatium.oldSneakingFeetPosition: Bring back the old sneaking feet position
animatium.oldSneakingFeetPosition.descri: Fixes the sneaking model offset to be like <1.14?
animatium.syncPlayerModelWithEyeHeight: Synchronize the player model to the eye height
animatium.syncPlayerModelWithEyeHeight.d: Synchronizes the player model to the eye height like in <=1.7.x.
animatium.sneakAnimationWhileFlying: Show the sneaking animation whilst flying in third-person
animatium.sneakAnimationWhileFlying.desc: Shows the sneaking animation in third-person whilst flying down like in <=1.13.x.
animatium.minimalViewBobbing.description: Removes the view bobbing from tilting the world.
animatium.showNametagInThirdperson.descr: Show the player nametag whilst in third-person.
animatium.applyTextShadowToNametag.descr: Make the nametag use text shadow.
animatium.persistentBlockOutline.descrip: Always show block outline, no matter the gamemode or state.
animatium.alwaysAllowUsageSwinging: Always allow item usage swing whilst holding left-click
animatium.alwaysAllowUsageSwinging.descr: Allows you to hold left click whilst using the item to keep swinging the arm, not just when looking at a block. Requires "Apply the swing offset during item use" to be enabled.
animatium.alwaysShowSharpParticles: Always show sharp particles on damage
animatium.alwaysShowSharpParticles.descr: Always show the sharpness particles when damaging/hitting an entity.
animatium.forceItemGlintOnEntity: Force item glint on armor glint
animatium.forceItemGlintOnEntity.descrip: Makes the entity glint use the same texture as the item glint like it was in <=1.19.
animatium.disableRecipeAndTutorialToasts: Disables the annoying tutorial and recipe unload toasts & sound.
animatium.disablePoseUpdates.description: Stops the server from updating your pose/animations. (Fixes MC-159163)
animatium.rotateBackwardsWalking.descrip: Rotates the entity body sideways when walking backwards like it was in <=1.11.2.
animatium.uncapBlockingHeadRotation.desc: Reverts the change in 1.20.2, making head rotation when blocking as it used to be.
animatium.removeHeadRotationInterpolatio: Removes the head rotation interpolation like in <=1.7.
animatium.fixVerticalBobbingTilt.descrip: Brings back the camera tilting when falling/flying up like it was in <=1.13.x. (Fixes MC-225335)
animatium.oldDeathLimbs.description: Makes entities continue their animation even upon death.
animatium.fixBowArmMovement.description: Restores old player body movement in third-person when using the bow like in <=1.7?
animatium.oldCapeMovement.description: Changes the cape model movement to be how it used to be in <=1.8? Currently broken and doesn't work properly.
animatium.oldFishingRodTextureStackCheck: Brings back old fishing rod stack texture check from <=1.8.
animatium.fishingRodLineInterpolation: Correctly interpolate the fishing rod cast line with the eye height
animatium.fishingRodLineInterpolation.de: Correctly interpolates the fishing rod cast line with the eye height from <1.14?
animatium.noMoveFishingRodLine: Disable fishing line movement while sneaking in third person
animatium.noMoveFishingRodLine.descripti: Does not move the fishing rod cast line while sneaking when viewed in the third person mode from <=1.7.
animatium.oldFishingRodLinePositionThird: Old third person fishing rod cast line position
Adjusts the position of the fishing rod cast line horizontally like in <=1.7.
animatium.fixCastLineCheck: Fix arm-related fishing rod cast line check (Fixes MC-109263)
animatium.fixCastLineCheck.description: Fixes the arm logic for casting the fishing rod.
animatium.fixCastLineSwing: Fix left handed fishing rod swing bug
animatium.fixCastLineSwing.description: Fixes the swing logic for casting the fishing rod.
animatium.tiltItemPositions: Modify/tilt the first-person held item's position
animatium.tiltItemPositions.description: Tilts the first-person held item position to make held items look like they did in <=1.7.x.
animatium.tiltItemPositionsInThirdperson: Modify/tilt the third-person held item's position
Tilts the third-person held item position to make held items look like they did in <=1.7.x.
animatium.legacySwordBlockingPosition: Modifies the arm's yaw to be 0 like in <=1.7
animatium.legacySwordBlockingPosition.de: Brings back the old third-person sword blocking look from <=1.7
animatium.lockBlockingArmRotation: Lock third-person arm rotation whilst blocking
animatium.lockBlockingArmRotation.descri: Locks the third-person blocking arm rotation.
animatium.applyItemSwingUsage: Apply the swing offset during item use
animatium.applyItemSwingUsage.descriptio: Block hitting (apply swing offset in item usage code).
animatium.removeEquipAnimationOnItemUse: Remove the equip animation when using a item
Fixes the blocking animation which plays the equip animation on use, and others.
animatium.showCrosshairInThirdperson.des: Show crosshair whilst in thirdperson like in <=1.8.x.
animatium.removeHeartFlash: Remove hearts flashing when taking damage
animatium.fixTextStrikethroughStyle.desc: Changes the text strikethrough position to make it look like it did in <=1.12.2.
animatium.oldListWidgetSelectedBorderCol: Old list widget selected border color
Returns the old list widget selected border color from <=1.15?
animatium.oldBlueVoidSky: Bring back the old blue void skybox
animatium.oldBlueVoidSky.description: Brings back the forgotten blue void part of the sky. (Fixes MC-257056)
animatium.oldSkyHorizonHeight.descriptio: Changes the horizon height to how it was in <=1.16.5.
animatium.oldCloudHeight: Bring back the old cloud height
animatium.oldCloudHeight.description: Changes the cloud height back to 128 like in <=1.16.5.
animatium.oldButtonTextColors: Bring back the old button text colors
animatium.oldButtonTextColors.descriptio: Bring back the old yellow hover/grayish text colors like in <=1.14.4.
animatium.removeDebugHudBackground: Remove the F3 debug hud background
animatium.removeDebugHudBackground.descr: Remove the F3 Debug Hud background,
animatium.debugHudTextShadow: Add text-shadow to F3 debug hud text
animatium.debugHudTextShadow.description: Add text-shadow to F3 Debug Hud.
animatium.oldChatPosition.description: Moves chat down 12 pixels like in <=1.8.x.
animatium.oldProjectilePosition: Bring back the old projectile position
animatium.oldBlockMiningProgress: Bring back the old block mining progress
animatium.oldBlockMiningProgress.descrip: Bring back the old block mining progress <=1.18?
animatium.disableItemUsingTextureInGui: Disable item usage texture in GUI
animatium.disableItemUsingTextureInGui.d: Disables the item usage texture in the GUI like in <=1.8.x (mainly rod/bow/crossbow).
animatium.disableInventoryEntityScissor: Allow full entity model rendering in inventory
Allows the inventory entity model to render fully.
animatium.disableCameraTransparentPassth: Stops camera passthrough in thirdperson in glass/etc.
animatium.itemDropsFaceCamera: Make item entities use camera yaw / face camera
animatium.itemDropsFaceCamera.descriptio: Makes item entities face the camera / use camera yaw like <=1.7.x when fast graphics.
animatium.itemDrops2D.description: Makes item entities render 2D when it's an item (not blocks).
animatium.oldDurabilityBarColors.descrip: Restores the old durability damage colors from <1.11.
animatium.oldItemRarities.description: Restores the old rarities for items visually from <1.21.2. (also old trident rarity from <1.21)
Removes the pesky blocking delay that modern clients have. Shouldn't flag on servers.
animatium.cameraVersion: Change camera position to be as it was in
animatium.cameraVersion.description: Change the camera position to be as it was in said version range.
